*sniff*: What happened?
（抽泣）: 發生了什麼事？

*sniff*: Are you okay?
（抽泣）: 你還好嗎？

*sniff*: You know I've been practicing my swordsmanship for a while...
（抽泣）: 你也知道我已經練劍好一陣子了……

*sniff*: Well I decided today would be the day I venture into the caves...
（抽泣）: 所以我決定今天下去洞窟探險……

*sniff*: ...but I got scared. I couldn't do it.
（抽泣）: ……但我很害怕。我做不到。

*sniff*: I guess I'm not as tough as I thought...
（抽泣）: 我可能沒有自己想像的那麼勇敢……

*sniff*: You're safe with me.
（抽泣）: 有我在你身邊就不會有危險了。

*sniff*: I get scared too.
（抽泣）: 我也很害怕。

*sniff*: You're crying like a little baby. Stop.
（抽泣）: 你哭得像個三歲小孩。別說了。

*sniff*: @, I... I really like you... And not just as a friend. You know that, right?
（抽泣）: @，我……我真的很喜歡你……不只是朋友間的那種喜歡。你明白我的意思吧？

*sniff*: I can't believe I'm actually saying this... But I can't keep it in anymore. I've felt this way for a long time.
（抽泣）: 真不敢相信我竟然說出口了……但我真的不想再忍下去了。這種想法我已經在心裡藏了好久。

*sniff*: You don't have to say anything right now. Let's just stay here for a while...
（抽泣）: 你現在什麼都不用說，就讓我們在這裡待一會吧……

*sniff*: I didn't know I felt this way about other girls... until I met you.
（抽泣）: 我從沒對其他女孩子有過這種感覺……直到我遇見了你。

*sniff*: Hmmm...
...I was just peering down into this old mine shaft.
（抽泣）: ……我只是在瞧瞧這座廢棄礦坑而已。

*sniff*: It's been abandoned for decades.
（抽泣）: 這個礦坑已經荒廢數十年了。

*sniff*: Still, there's probably good ore down there.
（抽泣）: 不過可能還是有一些不錯的礦石。

*sniff*: But a dark place, undisturbed for so long... I'm afraid ore isn't the only thing you'll find...
（抽泣）: 但是底下烏漆墨黑的，很久沒人下去過了……恐怕有的不只是礦石……

*sniff*: Here, take this. You might need it.
（抽泣）: 拿去，帶著這個吧。你或許用得上。

*sniff*: Name's Marlon, by the way. I run the adventurer's guild right outside.
（抽泣）: 順便告訴你，我叫馬龍，在洞窟外面經營探險家公會。

*sniff*: I'll keep my eye on you. Prove yourself and I might think about making you a member.
（抽泣）: 我會注意你的表現。如果你能證明自己的實力，我可能會考慮讓你加入公會。

*sniff*: {2}, wake up!
